Text.Page:
Life and death are part of a cycle, a system. We can interrupt it but the Dream ends for us all at some point. We must respect that.

I understand you've found creatures that live past death, even with their hearts separated. We cannot allow that to continue. Kill the {@LinkCreature:26#2001#revivified cromoses} and {@LinkCreature:26#2003#resurgent ghilliedhus} to protect the natural order.

Arun and Shara have plans for each creature in the world. It is dangerous to use magic to subvert those plans.

Your help is noted, . May the titans continue to Dream of you.
